meanings.sent1: The man was attired in a blue suit.
meanings.sent2: She looked elegant attired in a flowing gown.
meanings.sent3: The cat attired in a tiny hat was quite a sight.
meanings.sent4: The trees, attired in their autumn colors, painted a beautiful scene.

meanings.definition: To be dressed in a particular way.
meanings.sent1: He attired himself in his best attire for the party.
meanings.sent2: They attired in matching costumes for Halloween.
meanings.sent3: The penguin attired in a tuxedo waddled gracefully.
meanings.sent4: The garden attired in flowers bloomed with color.
meanings.sent5: She attired in confidence, ready to face any challenge.
